resultset.statement: select log.group_id,log.group_name,log.content_type, count(log.content_type) AS num, CURDATE() as endDate ,DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -6 DAY) as startData FROM behavior_chat_log log LEFT JOIN behavior_chat_audit audit ON log.chat_audit_id = audit.chat_audit_id INNER JOIN ( SELECT log.group_id, count(log.group_id) AS num FROM behavior_chat_log log LEFT JOIN behavior_chat_audit audit ON log.chat_audit_id = audit.chat_audit_id WHERE audit.app_pkg_name LIKE 'com.tencent.%qq%' AND log.talk_type = 1 AND log.chat_time >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -6 DAY) GROUP BY log.group_id ORDER BY num LIMIT 50 ) AS tmp ON log.group_id = tmp.group_id WHERE audit.app_pkg_name LIKE 'com.tencent.%qq%' AND log.talk_type = 1 AND log.chat_time >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -6 DAY) GROUP BY log.group_id, log.content_type ORDER BY tmp.num DESC
